snippet.title: Mystery at the Movie Club // FREE Otome Game
snippet.description:
"Mystery at the Movie Club" is an otome smartphone game by AbracadabraGames.

GooglePlay: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=info.otomedou.fwe.loveofthedeadEn&hl=ja
App Store: https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/mystery-at-the-movie-club/id1349576868

☆ Story ☆
"Please... Someone help me...!"

You've just entered university, and joined the school's movie club.
To prepare the movie to show at the culture festival,
you leave for summer camp together with your new friends.

Your first summer camp, your first movie shooting.
Your first Summer spent with "him".

However...

It seems like the camping grounds
have a chilling story behind them...

Your exciting, terrifying Summer starts now.

Category/Genre: Romance ADV / Otome
Age Restrictions: for all ages
Price: Free to Play (in-app purchases)
